jobDescription: We are looking for a Full Stack Developer with experience in building high-performing, scalable, enterprise-grade applications. You will be responsible for the full software development life cycle, from concept and design to testing.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain web applications using React and Node.js.
Ensure responsiveness and cross-platform optimization of applications.
Collaborate with the development team to create scalable software solutions.
requirements: Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer or similar role.
Experience developing desktop and mobile applications.
Knowledge of front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React).
Familiarity with databases (MySQL, MongoDB), web servers (Apache), and UI/UX design.
